content.text: Node.js Syllabus
Introduction
The W3Schools Node.js Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools Node.js Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of Node.js.

content.text: It is designed for beginners and requires only basic JavaScript knowledge.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The Node.js exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Node.js syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Node.js Developer" Certification.
